price: د آسمانونو، ځمكې او هغه څه پالونکی دی چې د هغو دواړو ترمنځ دي، كه تاسي باور كوونكي ياست.
arabic: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā in kuntum mūqinīna
